mapper.select: select s.stdno, s.name, a.absent, a.early, a.sick, a.late from (select stdno, name from student where classno=#{classno})s inner join attendence a on s.stdno=a.stdno and a.today=to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
select * from attendence where today = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') and classno=#{classno}
